Government Operations, Rules & Claims Committee will meet to continue discussion on extending
the contract of City Manager Louis A. DePasquale beyond January 2021
Public comment closed at 6:45 pm by motion of councillor McGovern. roll call, 5 in favor.
1.

A communication was received from Councillor Simmons, transmitting a letter from City Manager
Louis A. DePasquale, who is serving formal notice of his desire to enter into formal negotiations with
the City Council to extend his contract with the City beyond January 2021 .

motion by Councillor Toomey to authorize the chair of the government operations, rules & claims committee to
meet with the City manager to discuss his contract extension. passed 3-2
move to amend motion to insert "government operations, rules & claims committee". failed 2-3
sobrinho wheeler motion that the government operations, rules and claims committee meet to evaluate the
performance of the city manager prior to entering into negotiations to extend the city manager's contract.
Zondervam motion to amend "That the government operations committee will conduct a full performance
evaluation of the city manager prior to entering into negotiations around his request to extend his contract."
2.

A communication was received from Ruby Pierce Donohue, regarding city manager contract
extension

contract extension
